enforcerankroles.title: /enforcerankroles
enforcerankroles.description: This command will determine if ranked roles are required in order to join queues

register-all.title: /register-all
register-all.description: Registers existing users and server info into bot's memory

vc.title: /vc
vc.description: Creates a voice channel for the person who calls the command

setrole.title: /setrole
setrole.description: Assigns a role that was created in the server to a hierarchy of ranks that has been preset in the bot's memory

examples.exampleDescription:
The command takes two parameters where ```rolename``` is the where the level should go in the hierarchy and ``` role ``` is the name of the role you created in the server.

 The hierarchy goes from the lowest rank 

Iron -> Bronze -> Silver -> Gold -> Platinum -> Diamon -> Ascendent -> 
Immortal -> Radiant

help.title: /help
help.description: Creates this help modal in your DMs so that you can learn more about the bot and its features! :)

register.title: /register
register.description: Registers a new user to the bot's memory. This needs to be done before trying to join a tenman queue
